verses.text_plain: O Lord, thou hast searched me, and known me.
verses.verse_html: 1O Lord, thou hast searched me, and known me.

verses.text_plain: Thou knowest my downsitting and mine uprising, thou understandest my thought afar off.
verses.verse_html: 2Thou knowest my downsitting and mine uprising, thou understandest my thought afar off.

verses.text_plain: Thou compassest my path and my lying down, and art acquainted with all my ways.
verses.verse_html:
3Thou compassest my path and my lying down, and art acquainted with all my ways. ▼
▼ compassest: or, winnowest

verses.text_plain: For there is not a word in my tongue, but, lo, O Lord, thou knowest it altogether.
verses.verse_html: 4For there is not a word in my tongue, but, lo, O Lord, thou knowest it altogether.

verses.text_plain: Thou hast beset me behind and before, and laid thine hand upon me.
verses.verse_html: 5Thou hast beset me behind and before, and laid thine hand upon me.

verses.text_plain: Such knowledge is too wonderful for me; it is high, I cannot attain unto it.
verses.verse_html: 6Such knowledge is too wonderful for me; it is high, I cannot attain unto it.

verses.text_plain: Whither shall I go from thy spirit? or whither shall I flee from thy presence?
verses.verse_html: 7Whither shall I go from thy spirit? or whither shall I flee from thy presence?

verses.text_plain: If I ascend up into heaven, thou art there: if I make my bed in hell, behold, thou art there.
verses.verse_html: 8If I ascend up into heaven, thou art there: if I make my bed in hell, behold, thou art there.

tokens.text: there: if I make my bed

verses.text_plain: If I take the wings of the morning, and dwell in the uttermost parts of the sea;
verses.verse_html: 9If I take the wings of the morning, and dwell in the uttermost parts of the sea;

verses.text_plain: Even there shall thy hand lead me, and thy right hand shall hold me.
verses.verse_html: 10Even there shall thy hand lead me, and thy right hand shall hold me.

verses.text_plain: If I say, Surely the darkness shall cover me; even the night shall be light about me.
verses.verse_html: 11If I say, Surely the darkness shall cover me; even the night shall be light about me.

verses.text_plain: Yea, the darkness hideth not from thee; but the night shineth as the day: the darkness and the light are both alike to thee.
verses.verse_html:
12Yea, the darkness hideth not from thee; but the night shineth as the day: the darkness and the light are both alike to thee. ▼
▼ hideth…: Heb. darkeneth not
 , ▼
▼ the darkness and…: Heb. as is the darkness, so is the light

tokens.text: not from thee; but the night

footnotes.body_html: ▼ hideth…: Heb. darkeneth not

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the darkness and…: Heb. as is the darkness, so is the light
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the darkness and…: Heb. as is the darkness, so is the light

verses.text_plain: For thou hast possessed my reins: thou hast covered me in my mother’s womb.
verses.verse_html: 13For thou hast possessed my reins: thou hast covered me in my mother’s womb.

verses.text_plain: I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well.
verses.verse_html:
14I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well. ▼
▼ right…: Heb. greatly

verses.text_plain: My substance was not hid from thee, when I was made in secret, and curiously wrought in the lowest parts of the earth.
verses.verse_html:
15My substance was not hid from thee, when I was made in secret, and curiously wrought in the lowest parts of the earth. ▼
▼ substance: or, strength, or, body

tokens.text: from thee, when I was made

footnotes.body_html: ▼ substance: or, strength, or, body

verses.text_plain: Thine eyes did see my substance, yet being unperfect; and in thy book all my members were written, which in continuance were fashioned, when as yet there was none of them.
verses.verse_html:
16Thine eyes did see my substance, yet being unperfect; and in thy book all my members were written, which in continuance were fashioned, when as yet there was none of them. ▼
▼ all…: Heb. all of them
 , ▼
▼ which…: or, what days they should be fashioned

footnotes.body_html: ▼ all…: Heb. all of them

footnotes.body_text: ▼ which…: or, what days they should be fashioned
footnotes.body_html: ▼ which…: or, what days they should be fashioned

verses.text_plain: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them!
verses.verse_html: 17How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them!

verses.text_plain: If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.
verses.verse_html: 18If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.

tokens.text: them, they are more in number

verses.text_plain: Surely thou wilt slay the wicked, O God: depart from me therefore, ye bloody men.
verses.verse_html: 19Surely thou wilt slay the wicked, O God: depart from me therefore, ye bloody men.

verses.text_plain: For they speak against thee wickedly, and thine enemies take thy name in vain.
verses.verse_html: 20For they speak against thee wickedly, and thine enemies take thy name in vain.

verses.text_plain: Do not I hate them, O Lord, that hate thee? and am not I grieved with those that rise up against thee?
verses.verse_html: 21Do not I hate them, O Lord, that hate thee? and am not I grieved with those that rise up against thee?

tokens.text: thee? and am not I grieved

verses.text_plain: I hate them with perfect hatred: I count them mine enemies.
verses.verse_html: 22I hate them with perfect hatred: I count them mine enemies.

verses.text_plain: Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts:
verses.verse_html: 23Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts:

verses.text_plain: And see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.
verses.verse_html:
24And see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting. ▼
▼ wicked…: Heb. way of pain, or, grief

footnotes.body_text: ▼ wicked…: Heb. way of pain, or, grief
footnotes.body_html: ▼ wicked…: Heb. way of pain, or, grief
